basics.name: Aria
basics.label: UI/UX and Front-end Developer
basics.summary: A tech nomad, critical designer, and artful developer. She is a front-end developer, UI/UX specialist, and also a graphic designer. A regular in hackathons, she enjoys solving everyday problems with solutions that focus on efficiency and sustainability.

work.summary: Thinking Pandas is a software studio specializing in designing and developing world-class mobile and web applications for your business.

Incubix Technologies is a venture builder. A tech studio. A start-up that builds start-ups on a global level. It is the new paradigm in the start-up ecosystem - a first of its kind in the field of technology innovators and disruptors.
